title: Vision Tests
description:
👀 Vision Tests & Eye Exercises!

Our free vision test app is the perfect way to monitor your eye health and practice visual exercises. With an intuitive interface, you can easily perform a variety of tests and exercises to ensure your vision is always at its best.

Disease and Condition Management
Easily manage the progression of eye issues like fatigue.

Health Services and Management
Prevent eye problems with simple and effective exercises.

Medical Reference and Education
Receive valuable tips backed by healthcare professionals.

📱 How It Works:
- Keep your device 40 cm away.
- Choose from the available tests.
- Follow the on-screen instructions.

📝 Available Tests:
- Astigmatism: Evaluates difficulty seeing near and far.
- Myopia: Detects difficulty seeing at a distance.
- AMD: Identifies Age-Related Macular Degeneration.
- Color Blindness: Assesses difficulty distinguishing colors.

🎯 Visual Exercises:
- Simple and fun exercises to strengthen your eye muscles.
- Practice daily to keep your vision healthy.

Perfect for all ages, our app includes fun images for easy use by children.

NOTE: This app does not replace a medical exam. Consult an eye doctor for diagnosis and treatment of eye conditions.

Download now and start taking care of your eye health!
